hero.title: Transform Your Business with a High-Performance Online Store
hero.subtitle: Your e-commerce success relies on a robust, intuitive, and conversion-optimized platform
hero.description: At Numispark, we develop custom e-commerce solutions that transform your visitors into loyal customers and boost your revenue.

items.name: Custom Online Store Creation
items.description: We design fully customized e-commerce websites that perfectly reflect your brand and meet your business's specific needs.
expertise: Unique design perfectly aligned with your identity
items.conclusion: This custom approach is ideal for businesses with specific needs not covered by standard solutions, or wanting to stand out with a unique shopping experience.

items.name: PrestaShop Development
items.description: Harness the full potential of France's most popular open-source e-commerce solution to create a powerful and scalable store.
expertise: Connection with your business tools (ERP, CRM, logistics)
items.conclusion: PrestaShop offers an excellent balance between power, flexibility, and cost, ideal for SMEs and ambitious B2C or B2B e-commerce projects.

items.name: Shopify & Shopify Plus Development
items.description: Quickly launch a high-performance store thanks to the market-leading SaaS platform, renowned for its stability and ease of use.
items.conclusion: Shopify is the ideal solution for startups and brands wanting rapid market entry and a scalable platform without technical maintenance.

items.name: WooCommerce Development
items.description: Transform your WordPress site into a powerful and flexible online store, perfectly integrated with your existing ecosystem.
items.conclusion: WooCommerce is particularly suitable for businesses already with a WordPress site, or wanting to combine editorial content and e-commerce.

items.name: E-commerce Redesign and Migration
items.description: Transform your existing store into a modern, high-performance, growth-generating platform.
expertise: Complete audit of your current platform
items.conclusion: Our redesign process preserves your achievements while eliminating technical limitations that hinder your growth.

items.name: E-commerce Optimization & Conversion
items.description: Maximize your online store's performance with targeted optimizations on user experience and conversion.
expertise: Analysis of shopping journeys and friction points
Implementation of cross-selling and upselling strategies
items.conclusion: These optimizations allow you to significantly increase your conversion rate and average cart without requiring a complete redesign.

0.title: Analysis & Strategy
0.description: We start by understanding your business, products, market, and commercial objectives. Our analysis phase includes an audit of your existing platform (if redesign), in-depth competitive analysis, definition of ideal customer journeys, selection of the most suitable technical solution for your needs, planning of priority features, and establishment of a deployment timeline to ensure a successful launch.

1.title: E-commerce UX/UI Design
1.description: We design a shopping experience optimized for conversion. This phase includes creating wireframes of key pages (home, categories, product pages, cart, checkout), developing desktop and mobile graphic mockups, optimizing shopping journeys to maximize conversions, creating interactive prototypes for validation, and designing a responsive layout adapted to all devices.

2.title: Development & Integration
2.description: We develop your store with a focus on quality, performance, and scalability. This stage includes platform and hosting configuration, frontend and backend development of your solution, complete product catalog integration, setup of secure payment gateways, connection with your business tools (ERP, logistics), and functional and integration testing to ensure system reliability.

3.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
3.description: We meticulously validate every aspect of your store to ensure an impeccable user experience. This phase includes testing on all devices and browsers, complete shopping journey simulation, load and performance testing to ensure stability, security and compliance validation, business process testing (orders, inventory, etc.), and final optimization before launch.

4.title: Launch & Support
4.description: We ensure controlled deployment and post-launch monitoring to guarantee your success. This final stage includes production migration, comprehensive team training, provision of detailed technical and user documentation, responsive post-launch technical support, analysis of initial sales data to identify opportunities, and continuous optimizations and adjustments.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Numispark for Your E-commerce

reasons.title: Complete E-commerce Expertise
reasons.description: Our team combines technical expertise and understanding of e-commerce business challenges to create solutions that generate concrete results.

reasons.title: Focus on Conversion
reasons.description: We don't just create beautiful sites, but platforms that convert your visitors into customers through optimized shopping journeys.

reasons.title: Evolutivity & Scalability
reasons.description: Our solutions are designed to evolve with your business, from your first customers to significant order volumes, without compromising performance.

reasons.title: Security & Compliance
reasons.description: We implement the strictest standards in payment security (PCI-DSS) and data protection (GDPR) for complete peace of mind.

reasons.title: Data-Driven Approach
reasons.description: Our decisions are data-driven, with implementation of analytics tools to precisely measure your performance and identify opportunities.

platform.question: Which e-commerce platform do you recommend?
platform.answer: The choice depends on your specific needs, budget, and growth objectives. PrestaShop offers flexibility and complete customization at a controlled cost. Shopify enables quick start with less technical maintenance. WooCommerce is ideal if you already have a WordPress site. During our first consultation, we analyze your needs to recommend the most suitable solution.

cost.question: How much does creating an e-commerce site cost?
cost.answer: The budget varies considerably depending on complexity and features. A standard e-commerce site starts around €2,000 to €10,000, while a custom solution with complex integrations can represent an investment of €10,000 to €50,000. We offer phased approaches allowing you to spread the investment while quickly launching a functional first version.

timeline.question: What is the timeline to create an online store?
timeline.answer: Typical timelines range from 6-8 weeks for a standard store to 3-6 months for a complex e-commerce project with numerous integrations. Our agile approach allows us to launch a functional first version quickly, then progressively enrich the features.

traffic.question: How do you generate traffic to my online store?
traffic.answer: Our approach combines several levers: technical SEO optimization from conception, creation of content optimized for your strategic keywords, implementation of targeted Google Ads and social media campaigns, remarketing strategies, and integration with relevant price comparison sites and marketplaces. We also offer complementary digital marketing services to maximize your visibility.

maintenance.question: Do you offer e-commerce maintenance services?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer several maintenance packages adapted to your needs: technical maintenance (bug fixes, security updates), evolutionary (feature additions), and strategic (continuous conversion optimization). Our maintenance contracts start at €250/month and include guaranteed response time and regular performance reports.

security.question: How do you ensure my online store's security?
security.answer: Security is our priority. We implement best practices: secure hosting, SSL certificates, protection against attacks (XSS, CSRF, SQL injections), automatic backups, PCI-DSS compliance for payments, GDPR compliance for customer data, and regular security audits. Our solutions also include business continuity plans in case of incident.

management.question: Can I manage my store myself after launch?
management.answer: Absolutely! We develop intuitive administration interfaces customized to your needs. Complete training is included in our projects to enable you to manage your catalog, orders, and content autonomously. Detailed documentation and post-launch support accompany you in this onboarding.

optimization.question: How to optimize my e-commerce conversion rate?
optimization.answer: Conversion optimization is an ongoing process. We implement proven strategies: checkout simplification, friction reduction, product page optimization, implementation of reassurance elements, mobile performance improvement, and A/B testing of key elements. Our continuous optimization services regularly analyze your data to identify and correct friction points.

cta.title: Ready to transform your e-commerce business?
cta.description: Let's discuss your project and discover how we can create an online store that generates concrete results.
